11.post_text:
Dear customers, we are aware that there is a $100 McDonald’s gift card voucher redemption currently circulating online. We would like to clarify that we do not have such a promotion. 
 
We would also like to take this time to remind everyone to refer to our official Facebook page or website to check if any e-coupons are genuine. Thank you!
